title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other LLMs locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API for chat, generate, embed, pull, and list operations.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; supports streaming chat, embeddings, and model management.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that adds Ollama models as LLM and embeddings providers with tool-calling support.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama with multi-model chats, code highlighting, RAG, and user auth.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama exposing synchronous and asynchronous APIs for chat, generate, and model ops.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for interacting with the Ollama REST API in Rails or plain Ruby scripts.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI (text user interface) for browsing, chatting with, and managing local Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s inline chat and completion UX.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Lightweight React/Electron desktop app for chatting with Ollama models, packaged for Windows, macOS, and Linux.

title: ollama-cpp-py
summary: Python bindings that expose Ollama’s low-level C++ inference backend for custom embedded deployments.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration letting you use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production NLP pipelines.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Collection of copy-paste curl snippets for every Ollama REST endpoint plus Bash/Zsh completion helpers.

title: ollama-docker-stack
summary: Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, WebUI, Postgres for persistence, and nginx for TLS termination.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Curated list of officially supported GGUF models (Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, etc.) with one-line pull commands.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama responses into Discord threads with slash commands and per-guild model config.
